mapper.insert: INSERT INTO video_interaction (user_id, video_id, type, create_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{videoId}, #{type}, #{createTime})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM video_interaction WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND video_id = #{videoId} AND type = #{type}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM video_interaction WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND video_id = #{videoId} AND type = #{type} LIMIT 1
SELECT FROM video_interaction WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND type = 1 ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT v.id, v.title, v.description, v.user_id, u.nickname AS author_name, v.cover_url, v.video_url, v.category_id, v.duration, v.view_count, v.like_count, v.comment_count, v.share_count, v.status, v.audit_msg, v.is_hot, v.tags, v.is_deleted, v.create_time, v.update_time FROM video_interaction i JOIN video_info v ON i.video_id = v.id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON v.user_id = u.id WHERE i.user_id = #{userId} AND i.type = 2 AND v.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY i.create_time DESC LIMIT #{limit}
